snippet.title: DiRT 3 - Monte Carlo Rally Gameplay
snippet.description:
In this video, I show you some gameplay of the new DLC for DiRT 3 which is the Monte Carlo Rally Pack which gives you a brand new map with many stages on, and this map of coarse in the Monte Carlo Rally Track, there are many stages but this is the longest track so I decided to film a run through of it.

This isn't one of my best runs, But this video is to show you the new track, including the corners, the hairpins, the cliff sides, the sights and more. I am using Ken Blocks Ford Fiesta in this video, But videos coming soon may include gameplay footage of other cars such as a Mini Cooper S on this track. Overall this track is great and is very fun to drive through at 120mph+!

So I hope you enjoy the video, feel free to like, comment and subscribe! This was filmed with an HD PVR so 720p HD is recommended for best quality. 

***Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. Non-profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favor of fair use***

I do not own DiRT 3 or any of the music in the video. They are for entertainment purposes only.
